channel.title: NPC Problems
channel.description:
Ok I edited a little in NPC.cfg and Autospawn.cfg.
First I opened NPC.cfg, and edited NPC ID 19 (White Knight).
I changed name to White_Knight_Guard, made combat from 36 to 90 and set health level to 250.
I go into Autospawn.cfg, add an spawn with NPC 19 at bottom and set coords to Varrock.
Ok, he spawns but name is still "White Knight", level still 36 also is there a way to get him facing north?
Thanks in advance. Yes I searched and found only empty topics.
[b]Edit:[/b] I noticed health level does work.

item.title: NPC Problems
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Changing combat level on the NPCs is client-sided I think. You can still change their cb lvl in npc.cfg, but it’ll still appear as the original level

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Problems
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Ok I edited a little in NPC.cfg and Autospawn.cfg.

First I opened NPC.cfg, and edited NPC ID 19 (White Knight).

I changed name to White_Knight_Guard, made combat from 36 to 90 and set health level to 250.

I go into Autospawn.cfg, add an spawn with NPC 19 at bottom and set coords to Varrock.

Ok, he spawns but name is still “White Knight”, level still 36 also is there a way to get him facing north?

Thanks in advance. Yes I searched and found only empty topics.

Edit: I noticed health level does work.

Read full topic
